maqras.text: Unus response ex his people est their dictus Banish Lot's familia tuus oppidum; they est people qui wish est pure
Consequently nos saved eum his familia absque his uxor; nos comes eam among the doomed
Nos showered them certain shower est miserable shower people warned
Dictus Praise est DEUS pax est His servus whom He chose! Deus bonus idols some people est set

Qui Unus est created caelum terra? Qui est 1 qui sends down vos caelum aqua whereby nos produce gardens foderator de beauty! - Vos possibly non manufacture its trees est it alias deus DEUS? Indeed they est people qui deviated
Qui Unus factus terra habitable causa rivers run it locus it montis est created barrier 2 aqua? est it alias deus DEUS? Indeed multus de them non know
Qui Unus rescues those est become desperate alias Eum relieves adversity factus vos inheritors terra? est it alias deus DEUS? Rarely perfecit vos take heed
Qui Unus est guides vos darkness terra ac sea Qui Unus est sends winds bonus news signaling His mercy? est it alias deus DEUS? exalted est DEUS habuit any partner
Qui Unus initiates creation est tunc repeats it Qui Unus est provisus pro vos caelum terra? est it alias deus DEUS? Dictus Show me tuus proof si vos est truthful
Dictus Non 1 caelum terra knows future absque DEUS! They perfecit non et perceive quam when they resurrected
In fact, their knowledge Hereafter confused In fact, they harbor doubts it In fact, they est totally heedless thereof
Those disbelieved dictus nos turn into dust alias noster parentes nos get brought out
Nos dedit same promise in the elapsus. These est nihil tales ex preter
Dictus Roam terra note consequences guilty
Non grieve them non annoyed their scheming
They dictus When promise advenit pass vos est truthful
dictus Vos iam suffering some de retribution vos challenge
Tuus Dominus est foderator de gratia people multus de them est unappreciative
Tuus Dominus fully knows quod their chests hide quod they declare
(ibi est nihil caelum terra hidden Deus;) everything est profound actum
Hoc Quran settles multus proles Infans Israel; proles ut they adhuc disputing
multus assuredly it est guide mercy believers
Tuus Dominus est Unus qui scabinus them prout His dominus. He est Almighty Omniscient
Ergo put tuus trust DEUS; vos subsequentis manifest truth
Vos non factus peritus nor surdus hear alias they turn
Nor potuit vos guide blind their straying Unus unus hear vos est those believe in noster revelations decide est submitters
